2020 Corporate Social Responsibilty ReportSUSTAINABILITY ACCOUNTING STANDARDS BOARD (SASB) DISCLOSURE 
Amalgamated Bank is committed to reporting in alignment with leading ESG frameworks to ensure that our disclosures are 
consistent with leading best practices and helpful to each of our stakeholders. The Sustainability Accounting Standards Board is 
one such framework that we are proud to disclose to due to the emphasis on material ESG issues. We are excited to report our 
inaugural SASB index for reporting year 2020 under the SASB Commercial Banks (FN-CB) Standard.
